jobs.Escape Room: I created an interface for a simulated CCTV in an escape room. This project utilized SSH technology in conjuction with Python to send commands to a remote server for the game.
jobs.Drowsy Driver: I created a system that uses a heart rate monitor and an IR camera to detect when a driver is falling asleep while driving. The project used image recognition to detect when the driver's eyes were closed for a given amount of time and would alert them with a buzzer and flashing light accordingly.
jobs.Internet Radio: I created an internet radio/mp3 player using a Raspberry Pi. The audio source was controlled using a rotary encoder attached to the Pi, and the play/pause functionality was added using buttons.
jobs.Test Grader: I used openCV to create an automatic test grader that scans a test sheet like a scantron and tells the user their score. This job was rather challenging due to my then lack of experience using computer vision.
